column4: i just rebooted and now for some reason my monitor cant display my resolution
how can i go and change the resolution without being able to actually load ubuntu?
you can edit the xorg.conf from terminal, or from an editor on a LiveCD if it's that bad. Edit out all the resolutions you don't want, keeping the one you do.
yeah. Basically. You could also try running 'dpkg-reconfigure xserver-xorg' in  terminal. That's a bit more straightforward.
